AU_MAPPINGTRANSFORMATION.au_xslFile: <?xml version='1.0'?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.1" xmlns:saxonJavaMappingTransformation="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.MappingTransformation" xmlns:saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.support.dbquery.MapperQueryExecutor" xmlns:saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.AggregateFunctionHandler" xmlns:str="http://exslt.org/strings" exclude-result-prefixes="saxonJavaMappingTransformation saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler str" xmlns:saxon="http://saxon.sf.net/" extension-element-prefixes="saxon"> <xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" cdata-section-elements="" indent="yes" /><xsl:param name="_userName"/><xsl:param name="_password"/><xsl:param name="_class"/><xsl:param name="_identifier"/><xsl:param name="_subject"/><xsl:param name="_repositoryPath"/><xsl:param name="_Input1"/> <xsl:variable name="varConn" select="saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor:getInstance($_identifier,'false')"/> <xsl:variable name="apos">'</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="quot">"</xsl:variable><xsl:template match="/"> <!--Global PreCustom XSL starting--><xsl:for-each select = "."> <!--Global PreCustom XSL ending--><Root><xsl:apply-templates select="Root/Record" mode="_Root_Record_order1"> </xsl:apply-templates></Root> <!--Global PostCustom XSL starting--></xsl:for-each> <!--Global PostCustom XSL ending--></xsl:template><xsl:template match="/Root/Record" mode="_Root_Record_order1"> <Record><xsl:attribute name="recordNumber"></xsl:attribute><NAME><xsl:value-of select="NAME"/></NAME><SEX><xsl:value-of select="SEX"/></SEX><AGE><xsl:value-of select="AGE"/></AGE><CITY><xsl:value-of select="CITY"/></CITY><FIRST><xsl:value-of select="FIRST"/></FIRST><LAST><xsl:value-of select="LAST"/></LAST><GENDER><xsl:value-of select="GENDER"/></GENDER><SCHOOL><xsl:value-of select="SCHOOL"/></SCHOOL><STATE><xsl:value-of select="STATE"/></STATE><COUNTRY><xsl:value-of select="COUNTRY"/></COUNTRY><LOCATION><xsl:value-of select="LOCATION"/></LOCATION><MARRIED><xsl:value-of select="MARRIED"/></MARRIED><ADDRESS><xsl:value-of select="ADDRESS"/></ADDRESS><STATION><xsl:value-of select="STATION"/></STATION><DATEOFBIRTH><xsl:value-of select="DATEOFBIRTH"/></DATEOFBIRTH><HOSPITALNAME><xsl:value-of select="HOSPITALNAME"/></HOSPITALNAME><HOBBIES><xsl:value-of select="HOBBIES"/></HOBBIES></Record></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
